title: Audit Committee Establishment
description: a committee (or equivalent body) established by and amongst the board of directors of an issuer for the purpose of overseeing the accounting and financial reporting processes of the issuer and audits of the financial statements of the issuer
fotl_formula: forall c, b, i, p, r. (committee(c) and board(b) and publicCompany(i) and establishedBy(c, b) and boardOf(b, i) and purposeIsPurpose(c, @Compliance) and financialReport(r)) implies (oversees(c, r) and hasInternalControls(i, r))
conditions: board of directors exists,issuer has accounting and financial reporting processes
action: establish committee to oversee accounting and financial reporting processes and audits

title: Audit Committee Default
description: if no such committee exists with respect to an issuer, the entire board of directors of the issuer
fotl_formula: forall issuer, board. (publicCompany(issuer) and officer(board) and not exists committee. (officer(committee) and hasInternalControls(issuer, committee))) implies hasInternalControls(issuer, board)
action: entire board of directors serves as audit committee

title: Audit Report Preparation
description: prepared following an audit performed for purposes of compliance by an issuer with the requirements of the securities laws
fotl_formula: forall issuer, audit, report. (publicCompany(issuer) and financialReport(report) and auditPerformed(audit, issuer) and purposeIsPurpose(audit, @Compliance)) implies certifiesReport(issuer, report)
conditions: audit performed,issuer compliance with securities laws required
action: prepare audit report document following audit
